page.title: 02CLUBS
page.content: THERE ARE LOTS OF CLUBS IN {WOODLEY.}MANY OF THEM ARE SPORTS CLUBS.{SCOUTS}AND{GUIDES}ARE ALSO VERY POPULAR.IT VARIES WHERE THESE CLUBS ARE HELD.SOME IN{BULMERSHE}THE OTHERS IN CORONATION HALL OR{SOUTHLAKE CRESENT HALL.MOST CHILDRENS CLUBS ARE ORGANISED SUCH AS{GIRLS BRIGADE,BOYS {BRIGADE,SCOUTS,CUBS,GUIDES}AND {BROWNIES.}THERE ARE MANY DANCING CLUBS TOO,E.G{BALLET,}TAP AND TRADITIONAL DANCE.THERE IS ALMOST AS MANY CLUBS FOR ADULTS AS FOR CHILDREN, SUCH AS {BADMINTON,GOLF,SNOOKER,TENNIS}AND {DARTS.}THERE ARE A LOT OF{KEEP FIT CLASSES.MANY ACTIVITIES ARE HELD AT {BULMERSHE SPORTS CENTRE WHERE MANY SPORTING CLASSES ARE HELD FOR ADULTS AND CHILDREN.THE{SWIMMING POOL}AT THE {CENTRE OFFERS SWIMMING TO ALL AND MANY CLASSES ARE HELD THERE.
